reviews.review_msg: Will be using clicker for participation grade. Try to understand and memorize her lecture notes, midterm and final weren't easy. She gets really upset if you take pics in class, so big NONO. Also, she will move you around during exams and don't allow you to seat close to your friends so try not talk to your friends before the exam.

Jill is an amazing person as I've seen her a few times at her office hours, but the course itself is ridiculous. Even after studying and practicing the textbook questions over and over, I still manage to do poorly on both the midterms and final.
Great Pro! Clear notes and fair final~However, the midterms are really hard~ Texbook seems not useful, but the materials will help you a lot when you doing preview and review.

The prof is extremely  nice and willing to help but the course itself is a pain.  Her notes are very clear however her midterms are tortures!!!  If you wana lower ur GPA, be my guest and take the course.
sexy American voice.  handsome. easy to follow, good for first year student
